title: Xiongmao He Xiao Yan Shu (Panda and Little Mole)
synopsis: One day Little Mole finds a cuddly Panda toy in the fields. When the rightful owner claims Panda back Little Mole sets off on a journey to distant China so he can be reunited with Panda. Little Mole is good hearted, friendly and an amazing friend who does not hesitate to travel across the world to see his friend.
